title: 820-4924 no LCD/ KBD backlight   2015 LCD Screen Compatibilty
message:
Hi team,

I have a 820-4924 that was supposed to have a liquid damage, but when i opened it this one was very clean, no liquid traces, all water pads are white.
here are the 2 symptoms:
It always turns ON ( chime, display ) but sometimes the fan doesn't spin, i did a SMC reset but no changes.
I have no lcd and kbd backlight but i have PPVOUT_S0_LCDBKLT at 50V and PPVOUT_S0_KBDBKLT at 5V which means that there is no load ( screen backlight not detected ) as Louis explained it here [url]https://www.rossmanngroup.com/boards/forum/board-repair-troubleshooting/1145-macbook-air-no-backlight-troubleshooting-guide[/url].

I wanted to know which macbook screens are compatible, because I've tried good screen coming from a 2012 retina but I have no display/backlight at all.
Should I only respect the manufactured year whatever it's an Air or Pro or should it be the exact same model?

Thanks

title: 820-4924 no LCD/ KBD backlight   2015 LCD Screen Compatibilty
message:
1. The fan only spins on this model when the CPU gets warm. Not an issue just a stupid feature.
2. The ONLY LCD that will work with the 4924 is a 2015 13" display. 2013/14 will have picture with no backlight. Must be the 2015 screen. 
3. Keyboard backlight I have no idea. Tried another keyboard backlight?

title: 820-4924 no LCD/ KBD backlight   2015 LCD Screen Compatibilty
message: If you have 50V then you have the correct LCD. Pin 1 on the connector or cable is probably damaged. Could also be inside the LCD but that is more rare. Inspect connector and cable first.

title: 820-4924 no LCD/ KBD backlight   2015 LCD Screen Compatibilty
message:
Hi Dukefawks,
Once again you got it: it was the cable, pins 1 & 2 disconnected, also visually pin 1 didn't look good at all but on the connector at the LCD side, I mean in the LCD assembly.
Now backlight ok, I'm posting with it now.
But regarding the fan, I've installed Macs Fan Control and forced it to a constant speed but the fan doesn't spin, and the app reports speed at 0 as feedback.
Fan is controlled by the smc through the U5870, Q5871, Q5872 and Q5873, right?
Could you please quickly explain me how is it working, just wanna make sure I don't miss something.
Thanks in advance.

title: 820-4924 no LCD/ KBD backlight   2015 LCD Screen Compatibilty
message: Fan does not spin until it gets hot. This machine is fine now.
